name: Illumio
description: This app integrates with the Illumio Policy Compute Engine to implement actions for automating workload containment

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
List of traffic on specified port
actions.verbose: Allowed values for 'policy_decisions' parameter are: allowed, unknown, potentially_blocked, and blocked. Valid date format allowed: MM/DD/YYYY hh:mm:ss and YYYY/MM/DD hh:mm:ss. Supported timezone offset format for parameters 'start_time' and 'end_time' are Z(UTC), HH:MM, HHMM and HH.
